comment.author: 66084241@N00
comment._content: I suggest this was taken later than the date stated. The prices on the board appear to be in dollars and cents, and the change to decimal currency wasn't until 14th February 1966. Possibly this photo and the emphasis on the board was to document the prices in the new currency.

comment.author: 37408767@N03
comment._content:
Yes, that must be
And we can see the difference with now
Onions at 25 cents ! 
Veal at 1 dollar 85 !
Good old time
